summary: 2023-02-07. Rankings of top professionals often overlook the most important factor: personality. Comparably is an American platform with 15 million ratings of 70,000 companies which creates lists of "Best CEOs" based on data from the past six years, giving an accurate assessment of a leader's quality. Last year, Yamini Rangan (HubSpot) and Sarah Friar (Nextdoor) were amongst the top 10.
